mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manager (manager_id, manager_pw, manager_name, manager_email, manager_phone, manager_code) VALUES (#{manager_id}, #{manager_pw}, #{manager_name}, #{manager_email}, #{manager_phone}, #{manager_code})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM manager WHERE NOT manager_id IN ('employee') ORDER BY manager_code ASC
SELECT sum(order_quantity) as ORDERQUNTITY, item_no, TO_CHAR(order_date,'MM') as ORDERDATE FROM package GROUP BY item_no, TO_CHAR(order_date,'MM') ORDER BY sum(order_quantity) DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(sum(order_price), 'FM999,999,999') as ORDERPRICE, TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ORDERDATE FROM package group by TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(sum(order_price), 'FM999,999,999') as ORDERPRICE, TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM') as THISMONTH FROM package WHERE TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') group by TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM') ASC
SELECT count(item_no) as SUMITEMNO, item_no FROM likeitem GROUP BY item_no ORDER BY count(item_no) DESC
SELECT count(keyword) as COUNTKEYWORD, keyword FROM search GROUP BY keyword ORDER BY count(keyword) DESC
UPDATE manager SET manager_code = #{manager_code} WHERE manager_id = #{manager_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM manager WHERE manager_id = #{manager_id} AND manager_pw = #{manager_pw}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(TRUNC(TO_CHAR(member_birthday, 'YYYY')/10)) AS COUNTPEOPLE, TRUNC(TO_CHAR(member_birthday, 'YYYY')/10) AS AGE FROM member GROUP BY TRUNC(TO_CHAR(member_birthday, 'YYYY')/10) ORDER BY TRUNC(TO_CHAR(member_birthday, 'YYYY')/10) DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CATEGORY ORDER BY COUNTSELL DESC) AS RNUM, COUNTSELL, ITEMNAME, CATEGORY FROM (SELECT count(package.item_no) AS COUNTSELL, item.item_category AS CATEGORY, item.item_name AS ITEMNAME FROM package FULL OUTER JOIN item ON package.item_no = item.item_no GROUP BY item.item_category, item.item_name ORDER BY CATEGORY ASC, COUNTSELL DESC) WHERE COUNTSELL != 0) A WHERE A.RNUM = 1
